com::xuggle::xuggler::IStreamCoderThe work horse of the Xuggler: Takes IPacket data from an IContainer (representing an IStream) and an ICodec and allows you to decode or encode that data
com::xuggle::xuggler::ITimeValueTime (duration) values with units
com::xuggle::xuggler::IVideoPictureRepresents one raw (undecoded) picture in a video stream, plus a timestamp for when to display that video picture relative to other items in a IContainer
com::xuggle::xuggler::IVideoResamplerConverts IVideoPicture objects of a given width, height and format to a new width, height or format
com::xuggle::ferry::JNIHelperThe JNIHelper object contains a series of methods designed to assist functions when running inside a Java JVM
com::xuggle::ferry::JNIMemoryManagerThis class's implementation of malloc() and free() will forward to the standard library's malloc() and free(), UNLESS you're running in a JVM, in which case it will use Java to manage the memory for us
